column4: Ok, update is going to take forever. I really, really confused xD.
6h 45m remaining.
I did the Mirror thing.
This is annoying. I like Ubuntu, but I wish it would download as quick as Vista does.
I know it sounds odd, but it's true.
Well...if you're going to measure the worth of an OS according to its download speed, then.
However, I doubt you'll understand this...but the Vista TCP/IP stack is horrible.
sudo ufw status - Is it enabled?
No dear. Go to a terminal and type that to find out whether your firewall is enabled.
Applications -> Accessories -> Terminal
There you go.
System -> Admin. -> Software Sources.
Sometimes the repo servers get congested. But do pick one near you.
You just installed? Which version, intrepid?
Yes. :)
I don't see why not...can you mount that partition?
Security risk.
Type "sudo apt-get install wine"
Close all other terminal windows and GUI synaptic, etc.
Let the poor manager finish its job. :)
There's no need to apologize. :) We all learn.
